messages.title: Better education
messages.content: Thanks to Labour, we now have 4 Sure Start Centres in our area, 160 extra teaching assistants, 260 other support staff, 40 more primary school teachers and 40 more secondary school teachers

messages.title: A more prosperous area
messages.content: Under a Labour Government, Bexhill and Battle have seen huge investment; including Bexhill High School, local flood defences and De La Warr Pavilion restoration. Under the Tories, projects such as these would be threatened.

messages.title: More health services
messages.content: There are over 4,000 more qualified nurses, 500 doctors, 500 midwives and 50 dentists across the South-East than there were under the Tories.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will fight unwelcome changes such as the Tories' plan for a landfill site at Ashdown and the proposal to cut Cannon Street rail services.
Essential NHS services must have local, easily accessible health services. Older residents deserve our hands.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fairer future for older people
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Discrimination in the age of retirement services and increases in the winter fuel allowance.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Helping people get back to work
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Work to increase the number of apprenticeships, training, and volunteering opportunities.
Will always put constituents first, attend the local surgeries, hold regular street meets, and will never misuse position as an MP.

issues.education: Thanks to Labour, we now have 4 Sure Start Centres in our area, 160 extra teaching assistants, 260 other support staff, 40 more primary school teachers and 40 more secondary school teachers
issues.health: There are over 4,000 more qualified nurses, 500 doctors, 500 midwives and 50 dentists across the South-East than there were under the Tories.

housing.content: Under a Labour Government, Bexhill and Battle have seen huge investment; including Bexhill High School, local flood defences and De La Warr Pavilion restoration. Under the Tories, projects such as these would be threatened.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am part of a new generation, ready for the challenge of rebuilding trust in politics.

politicalExperience.role: Your Labour Candidate for Bexhill and Battle

endorsements.endorsement: Having worked with children and families for 33 years, I have seen how the extra resources provided by the Labour Government have made a big difference to those who need them most. I know that James the best chance of looking after - and that's why I and many friends and colleagues will be backing James for MP.
